museums.title: Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen
museums.description: Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen is an art museum located in Rotterdam. It houses a vast collection of art, including paintings, sculptures, and design objects.

museums.title: Kunsthal Rotterdam
museums.description: Kunsthal Rotterdam is a contemporary art museum situated in the Museumpark area of Rotterdam. It hosts various temporary exhibitions throughout the year.

museums.title: Maritime Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: The Maritime Museum Rotterdam showcases the maritime history of the city. It features exhibits on shipping, ports, and shipbuilding, as well as interactive displays.

museums.title: Netherlands Photo Museum
museums.description: The Netherlands Photo Museum focuses on photography and visual culture. It displays a diverse collection of photographs, both historical and contemporary.

museums.title: Museum Rotterdam
museums.description: Museum Rotterdam showcases the history and development of the city. It offers insights into Rotterdam's architecture, cultural heritage, and social history.

museums.title: Het Nieuwe Instituut
museums.description: Het Nieuwe Instituut explores the intersections of architecture, design, and digital culture. It presents exhibitions, events, and research projects.

museums.title: Depot Boijmans Van Beuningen
museums.description: Depot Boijmans Van Beuningen is a new art storage facility and exhibition space. It houses the collection of Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen and allows public access to view the stored artworks.

museums.title: Chabot Museum
museums.description: Chabot Museum is an art museum located in the former home and studio of Dutch painter and sculptor Henk Chabot. It displays his works and hosts temporary exhibitions.

museums.title: Wereldmuseum Rotterdam
museums.description: Wereldmuseum Rotterdam focuses on the arts and cultures of different regions around the world. Its collection includes ethnographic objects, textiles, and artifacts.

museums.title: Kunstinstituut Melly
museums.description: Kunstinstituut Melly, formerly known as Witte de With Center for Contemporary Art, is an institute for contemporary art. It presents exhibitions, publications, and events.
